name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience in **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, **Python**, and **NoSQL** technologies, specializing in building high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Vue.js**, **Django Rest Framework**, and adept at employing **Event-Driven Architecture** to develop scalable solutions. Extensive cloud experience with **AWS** and **GCP**, utilizing **MongoDB** and **DynamoDB** for efficient data management.

I possess a solid background in **Agile Software Development**, emphasizing **Test Automation** and **Observability** with tools such as **Datadog**. My experience includes implementing **Container-based Architecture** and **Serverless Architecture** while using **Kubernetes**, **CircleCI**, and **GitHub Actions** for continuous integration and deployment. Well-versed in utilizing **Celery** for task queues and **EventBridge** for event-driven workflows.

Additionally, I have led the development of enterprise-grade platforms integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation, ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. I bring hands-on experience in developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools like MLflow and Airflow.
